name: Downbreak
description: People swept mines for long years but now the game has changed! Welcome to Downbreak; the gravity based minesweeper. Experience a true classic reimagined with more features than ever!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Or Later Processor: 2.0 GHZ Dual Core Processor Or Higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 7600GT or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Or Later Processor: 2.4 GHZ Dual Core Processor Or Higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 9400GT or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
